june.details: Plow the field, apply organic manure. Treat seeds with fungicide.
june.irrigation: Flood the field 1 week before transplanting

july.details: Transplant 25-30 day old seedlings. Maintain 15cm spacing.

august.details: Remove weeds manually or use herbicide. Apply nitrogen fertilizer.

september.details: Monitor for brown plant hopper and stem borer. Panicle initiation stage.

october.details: Monitor for diseases. Prepare for harvest in late October.

november.details: Harvest when grains are golden yellow. Dry properly before storage.
